author: Emma Dibdin
title: Walking Dead star Norman Reedus talks Daryl's sexuality and passionate fan base - The Walking Dead Cult -
text: As we near The Walking Dead's sixth season premiere, the most suspenseful question of all is yet to be answered – what's up with Daryl's love life?The fan favourite character's lack of any romantic interests thus far in the show has led to rampant speculation, with many fans suggesting that he is gay, and others fervently pairing him with Carol (Melissa McBride) or Beth (Emily Kinney). © AMC / Gene Page "I'm not opposed to it and I'm not running towards it," Reedus told Digital Spy and others, asked whether the new season would see Daryl get a love interest."There was a hint [that he might be gay] and I was down with that too. Whatever they give me, I'm gonna run with and I'm gonna try and kick ass with."He went on to discuss Daryl's passionate fan base, and the conflict between fans of his relationships with Carol versus Beth. © AMC / Gene PageDaryl (Norman Reedus) with Carol (Melissa McBride) in season four "Oh I know, there's a war out there! And people get mad at me, they get legit mad at me. If I say something in an interview that sounds like I'm not respecting a relationship with one of the cast members, I personally get attacked for it."I don't get to pick these things, or else I would've had sex with every single character on this show already!"For what it's worth, Walking Dead creator Robert Kirkman confirmed earlier this year that Daryl is straight – but there's no evidence either way in the show so far, so we're saying everything's still in play.The Walking Dead season six will premiere on AMC in the US this Sunday (October 11), and on Fox in the UK the following evening (October 12).
